fullplot: Flanders tells the story of Demester, a man whose girlfriend cheats on him out of frustration with his lack of emotion.
plot: Flanders tells the story of Demester, a man whose girlfriend cheats on him out of frustration with his lack of emotion.
title: Flanders

tomatoes.consensus: Though Bruno Dumont recycles his typical themes and motifs, Flanders is also just as beautifully shot and convincingly acted as the director's previous movies.
